meanings.definition: A small compact mass of a substance
meanings.sent1: The detergent granule was enough for a full load of laundry.
meanings.sent2: He found a granule of wax stuck to the table.
meanings.sent3: The granule of chocolate seemed to wink at her mischievously.
meanings.sent4: The granule of truth in his words was hard to ignore.
meanings.sent5: The granule of soil held the promise of a new plant growing.
